title: 12 "Bye-bye Mega-Playboy"Transliteration: "Baibai Megapureibōi" (Japanese:バイバイメガプレイボーイ) December 23, 1994(1994-12-23)
transformers_text: 12 Bye bye Mega Playboy Transliteration Bai bai Mega pure ib i Japanese December 23 1994 1994 12 23 After a tough fight Junta at last defeats Ry ji by transforming into Mega Playboy Karin believes that as long as Ami stays with Junta he will never turn into the Mega Playboy again Karin flies off in her time ship only to return shortly afterwards saying her mission got extended
tf_idf_text: bye bye mega playboy transliteration bai bai mega pure japanese december tough fight junta last defeat transform mega playboy karin believe long ami stay junta never turn mega playboy karin fly time ship return shortly afterwards say mission get extend
